arts.ttl: Lens predicted XI v Monaco: Malang Sarr to start against former side
arts.sum: Pierre Sage has a completely fit RC Lens squad at his disposal for the trip to face AS Monaco on Saturday night. It is rare, in this age, for a…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Lens: Eric Dier and Ansu Fati to return?
arts.sum: AS Monaco are set to welcome some important players back to the fold when they host RC Lens on Saturday night. Against Bodo/Glimt, Monaco were without nine first-team players. Many…

arts.ttl: Monaco’s Paul Pogba won’t return against Lens
arts.sum: AS Monaco manager Sébastien Pocognoli has confirmed that Paul Pogba (32) will not feature against RC Lens this weekend. La Pioche’s return is planned for after the international break. Pogba was close…
